Egwuregwu
Ihe nkiri
Nke ka ewuewu
Akụkọ
Egwuregwu
Ihe nkiri
Nke ka ewuewu
Ebe foto si, Senate/Simon Ekpa/Facebook
Ndị Ụlọomeiwu Ukwu Naijiria akatọọla nọrọ n'ụlọ ma kpoo oku ka a kpụlata onye ndu alaka otu Ipob kpọrọ onwe ha 'Autopilot'bụ Simon Ekpa Naijiria ka ọ bịa zara ọnụ ya n'ụlọikpe.

A na-ebo Simon Ekpa bụ nwa afọ Naijiria bi mba Finland ebubo itinye iwu nọrọnụlọ n'Ọwụwa Anyanwụ kwa Monde Ekpa iji kpo oku ka a tọhapụ onye ndu otu Ipob bụ Nnamdi Kanu bụ onye e ji eji maka ebubo ịkpa nkata ịkwatu gọọmentị Naijiria.
Simon Ekpa: Ihe ndị Igbo nwere agba na-ekwu maka ihe Ekpa na-agabiga na Finland24 Febụwarị 2023
Simon Ekpa: Ohaneze, Pandef, Afenifere na ndị ọzọ ewegarala Gọọmentị Finland mkpesa18 Febụwarị 2023
Sit-at-home: Ihe 'South East Forum', Ohaneze kwuru maka nọrọnụlọ Simon Ekpa tinyere14 Julaị 2023
Ha kpebikwara ịkpọ onyennọchiteanya mba Finland na  Naijiria oku  maka okwu ọnọdụ Ekpa na mba ahụ.
Onye omeiwu na na-anọchite, Imo-West n'ụlọomeiwu Ukwu Naijiria bụ Osita Izunaso bụ onye kpalitere okwu a n'Ụlọomeiwu Ukwu ụbọchị Wenezde n'aha ndị senetọ si Ọwụwa Anyanwụ.
Izunaso tụrụ arịrị na nọrọnụlọ a kụtụọla ọnọdụ akụnaba Ọwụwa Anyanwụ, agụmakwụkwọ, azụmahịa na ahụike sịrị, "Okwu a bụ iji katọrọ nọrọnụlọ na-eme n'Ọwụẁa Anyanwụ Naijiria."
"Puku kwuru puku mmadụ atụfuola ndụ ha kemgbe nọrọnụlọ a nke mere ka ndị na-etinye ego na nkwalite akụnaụba gbaapụ n' Ọwụwa Anyanwụ."
"Ụlọomeiwu na-atụ uche ma ọ bụrụ na-agbaghị ụzọ owere mgba n'ihe gbasara, ọ gaghị echi, Simon Ekpa ga-eduhie ndị ntọrobịa."
Enyinnaya Abaribe sịrị, " onye amaghị ebe mmiri starts beating you, you would not know
" Sit-at-home malitere n'Ọgọstụ 2021 oge Ipob kwuru na ha ga aga nọrọnụlọ n'ihi njichi onye ndu ha."
"Oge ha mechara kha sị na ha anaghị anọkwa n'ụlọ, ndị omekome zoro n'ahụ nọrọnụlọ.
"Ụfọdụ ndị agboro pụta ha gbuo mmadụ, see ya onyonyo gbasa na soshal midia."
"O nweghị onye nọ n'Ọwụwa Anynanwụ nọrọnụlọ masịrị. Ọ bụ ndị omekome na-eme ihe."
"Ha ji iyi egwu na-emenye ndị mpaghara nile egwu."
Otunba Gbenga Daniels nyere nkwado ya sịrị, na nsogbu ahụ na-emetụ mpaghara ndị ọzọ.
"Ọ dị mkpa ịgwụsị nsogbu ."
"Ọtụtụ ndị mmadụ anwụọla n'ihi ihe a dịka Gụlak bụ ndị a sị na ndị na-amanye nọrọnụlọ gbagburu ya."
Ebe foto si, NGRSENATE/Facebook
N'okwu ya, onyeisi Ụlọomeiwu Naijiria Akpabio, jụrụ, "Kedụ ihe ndị gọvanọ merela iji gboo nsogbu a?"
Onyeisi Ụlọomeiwu Ukwu bụ Godwin Akpabio," Ọ bụrụ na ndị gọvanọ Ọwụwa Anyanwụ na-erubere nọrọnụlọ, ndị ọrụ oyibo na-erubere ihe ọ pụtara bụ na ọ bụ Simon Ekpa si Finland achị Ọwụwa Anyanwụ."
Ọ gara n'ihu sị, "Ndị gọvanọ na-ata ego pụrụ iche maka nchekwa, kedụ ihe ha ji ya eme?"
N'oku ụfọdụ ndị Senetọ si Ọwụị̀anyanwụ ka  Gọọmentị Naijiria  si ụzọ ndọrọndọrọ lebanye anya n'okwu Nnamdi Kanu, onye ndu Sineti bụ Bamidele Opeyemi kwuru ka akụpụ ya sị n'na okwu ahụ dị n'ụlọikpe.
